tool_description: Search embedded game guides for gameplay tips, strategies, walkthroughs, and game-specific information

available_commands.description: Search all game guides for relevant information. Returns top 5 results. Optional game_name filter.
Search a specific game's guide. Returns top 5 results.
Get all section headings from a specific game guide.

tool_usage_guidance: Use specific search terms related to gameplay: 'crafting', 'boss fight', 'farming', 'building'
All search commands return exactly 5 most relevant results from the guides
search: General search across all game guides with optional game filter
search_game: Search within a specific game's guide (more precise results)
list_games: Use this first if you're unsure which games have guides
get_sections: See what topics are covered in a specific game's guide
Game names are case-insensitive (minecraft = Minecraft = MINECRAFT)
Searches work on both guide content and section headings
proactive_triggers: When user asks 'how do I' or 'how to' about game mechanics
When user mentions specific game titles and needs help
When user asks about crafting, building, strategies, or game progression
When user is stuck on a game section or boss fight
When user wants to know what content is available for a game

metadata.notes: Searches embedded game guides stored separately from base knowledge. Returns exactly 5 results per query. Supports filtering by game name. Uses vector similarity search with keyword fallback.
